episodes.title: Carl Lentz’ Kids Open Up (About Everything)
episodes.description: It's time to turn the lights on. Episode 3 is loading!!! The last four years have been a whirlwind of heartbreak, devastation, healing, & restoration. I, Carl Lentz, am beyond excited to have a space where we can all turn on the lights & address our darkness. Thank you for joining us for episode 3. Let us know how this portion of the story speaks to you. We will address how we navigated parenting during this fragile time, how our children opened up about their perspective over the past few years, and more. episodes.title: Carl and Laura Lentz Open Up (about everything...)
episodes.description: After 4 years, Carl & Laura Lentz are ready to open up to the world. Welcome to Lights On with Carl Lentz. We will deep dive into the dark season that how now turned to light for the Lentz'. This episode is a no-filter, raw & honest conversation to bring hope, & provide a space for safety. Join us, and let's turn on the lights together. episodes.title: Lights On with Carl Lentz | Trailer
episodes.description: “Lights on” will be available on 06.04.24. My choices, and the road toward recovery taught me how helpful it is to have people share vulnerably the impact of their bad choices, the pain they caused, and the pain they suffered that led them to make those choices, and what they’ve discovered can be helpful and healing. My hope is that in sharing those things from my story and asking others to share theirs, it will be helpful, hopeful and healing. I’m thankful for where we are today. To be confident of the future, content in the present and healed enough to speak to the past is miraculous. If we can make it, anybody can…thank you for all the love and support!
